text: @realDonaldTrump All you have done is royally screw up every institution of our gov’t, trample the Constitution & failed miserably in the handling of the coronavirus. We don’t want your stinking judges, the 2nd Amendment is not in danger, the military is not rebuilt & only the rich got tax cuts.
